body.name: Mickey Mouse Activity Folding Table & Chair Sets For Childrens – Includes 2 Kid Chairs with Non Skid Rubber Feet & Padded Seats – Sturdy Metal Construction

features: Join your favorite friend with the Mickey Mouse Folding Kids Activity Table Set from Jakks Pacific
Includes folding table for kids to use for drawing, eating & playing with 2 padded fold up chairs for extra comfort and easy travel
Full color Disney Mickey character graphics and non skid rubber feet to help protect floor surfaces and keep table stationary
Designed for durability and safety with sturdy metal tubular construction and double locking mechanism
Kid Sized (Ages 3-7) – 24 inches W square table top x 20 inches H (61cm x 53cm), assembly required (tool included)
body.description: With this table and chair set from JAKKS Pacific, sitting at the kid's table has never been more fun. With bright colored chairs and table, your children are bound to have a blast whether they're eating, playing games, drawing, or doing their homework. Perfect for playrooms, classrooms, day cares, Sunday schools and kids rooms. The set includes bright character graphics which is ideal for children's rooms. A terrific way for children to socialize and learn table manners. Use as a game table, LEGO table or a place to put your children's favorite toys, puzzles, and coloring books. A must-have for day cares and nurseries. Also ideal for waiting rooms, and doctor's office, and any space where children need a play Place. Sturdy metal tubular steel construction: water-resistant and durable, this table and chair set will withstand the all children's play time. Easy to clean surface and easy to assemble: Table and chairs come disassembled and can be put together easily with the included tool. Promote your child's imagination while providing them a safe and colorful place to learn & play with this fun and affordable table and chair set. So sit back and enjoy the freedom your kids will experience, by having a table of their very own.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 1,380 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this table for my kids and its super cute! It was so easy to set up which made things even better because I hate setting up stuff lol, its sturdy enough for my 6 year old and even me to sit and color or eat a meal. I also love that the table top is plastic and the chairs, even kind of soft so its super easy to clean and comfy to sit. A great purchase for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had this for my son when he was little (now 14) and I had gotten rid of a long time ago. I've been looking for awhile for another and all of the ones I've found are cheap, have bad reviews, come with only 1 chair etc. And finally I found this. The same my first son had. Now I have 2 little ones and this chair is perfect. My 2 year old loves it, sits in the chair and eats his meals now, plays toys on it, watches TV at it, its versatile, sturdy and extremely easy to clean. And he will be able to use for years. My last one was able to use until he was 8. The chair locks into place so a child cannot close it and there is no assembly required. I'm not letting this one go. Great price too compared to others. Definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great foldable table
reviews.reviewText: The table is great! We can foldIt away if we want. It is very strong my 8 year old sits on the chairs all the time and they can handle him! My 2 and 4 year old stand on the chairs and abuse the table and it is still standing great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars LOVELY TABLE SET
reviews.reviewText: i brought one for my boys, it is higher than most tables like this and i love that, it is also super easy to wipe down. I absolutely love how you can fold the table and chairs for storage. easy to close and put into a closet or slide underneath the bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a cute table
reviews.reviewText: This is a great table is very sturdy but not quite sturdy enough for our children but then again most everything made for children is not sturdy enough for our children. The table is not broken just the back of one of the chairs it tore a little on the padding of the table but other than that it is so far so good and we have had it for at least 2 or 3 months or more the kids love having their own little table with mickey
